CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The target poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) ( PCDSeBT ) was obtained by Suzuki polymerization of M1 and M2 in degassed toluene / water with K 3 PO 4 as an organic base , Pd 2 ( dba ) 3 as a catalyst , and P(o-tol) 3 as the corresponding ligand at 90 °C for 3 days.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) |
| M1 |
| M2 |
| K 3 PO 4 |
| Pd 2 (dba) 3 |
| P(o-tol) 3 |

Note:

* poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) is the target material, also known as PCDSeBT.
* M1 and M2 are precursor materials used in the Suzuki polymerization reaction.
* K 3 PO 4, Pd 2 (dba) 3, and P(o-tol) 3 are reagents used in the Suzuki polymerization reaction.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with only the valid entities that clearly refer to material names:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) |
| M1 |
| M2 |

The following entities were removed from the original list as they do not clearly refer to material names:

* K 3 PO 4 (reagent)
* Pd 2 (dba) 3 (catalyst)
* P(o-tol) 3 (ligand)

Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The target poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) ( PCDSeBT ) was obtained by Suzuki polymerization of M1 and M2 in degassed toluene / water with K 3 PO 4 as an organic base , Pd 2 ( dba ) 3 as a catalyst , and P(o-tol) 3 as the corresponding ligand at 90 °C for 3 days.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| M1 |
| M2 |
| K3PO4 |
| Pd2(dba)3 |
| P(o-tol)3 |
| 90°C |
| 3 days |

Note:

* M1 and M2 are the monomers used to synthesize the target polymer PCDSeBT.
* K3PO4 is the organic base used in the Suzuki polymerization reaction.
* Pd2(dba)3 is the catalyst used in the Suzuki polymerization reaction.
* P(o-tol)3 is the ligand used in the Suzuki polymerization reaction.
* 90°C is the temperature at which the Suzuki polymerization reaction was performed.
* 3 days is the duration of the Suzuki polymerization reaction.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that refer to "Value of material property":

| Property Value |

| Pd2(dba)3 |
| P(o-tol)3 |
| 90°C |
| 3 days |

Note:

* K3PO4, Pd2(dba)3, and P(o-tol)3 are the chemical formulas of the organic base, catalyst, and ligand used in the Suzuki polymerization reaction, respectively. These formulas indicate the specific materials used in the reaction.
* 90°C and 3 days are the temperature and duration of the Suzuki polymerization reaction, respectively. These values are important in determining the properties of the resulting polymer.
